review: Works as the others I have.

review: Love my Fire TV Stick! Works great and has a lot of features with Prime!

review: This is the most amazing thing ever!  I use it all day everyday!  I especially like pairing my Spotify to the TV and hear the music in the house when I come in from a workout!

review: Love the Amazon stick, glad to have all major app.

review: Great Product,it works better than the Google Chrome, the only problem is that I live in Mexico and due to geographical restrictions I cannot watch Amazon Prime Video :(

review: Easy to use. The only downside is the remote doesn't light up and you can't see the buttons in a dark room. Otherwise it performs as advertised.
